result.eng: We worked together to fix the problem.
result.ga: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteachWe worked together to fix the problem.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ag obair as láṁa a ċéile ċun an ḟaḋb a réiteaċWe worked together to fix the problem.
